file_content.text: That's far enough. We're almost done here.
Nikollan, what are you doing?
The cloaking device prototype belongs to the people of Balmorra, not the Republic. This is our world, our war and our victory.
The Empire was on the verge of wiping out the resistance before we got here.
The Republic helped you.
You had a shortcut into this place, and you didn't tell us?
How did you get up here?
We stole this Imperial transport during the raid on Sobrik. Security here was too busy fighting you to double-check our identification.
Keep your blasted world--but the Jedi will have that cloaking device. Hand it over. Now.
Give me the prototype.
You have no authority here.
We spent decades fighting for this planet after the Republic rolled over for the Empire. Now you're back to loot our resources?
This prototype may be the most valuable technology on Balmorra. You're not taking it.
Aren't the Jedi all about justice? If that's true, let us leave with what's rightfully ours.
The cloaking device isn't the real prize. The Empire's research is what you want. They learned how to cloak missiles and bombs.
I'll trade you my data for it.
Isn't that more valuable to Balmorra's future security? I'll give you the data in exchange for the prototype.
Interesting offer... one I'm inclined to accept. You have a deal.
The Jedi will return this technology once we're done with it. Please hand it over.
[Force Persuade] Trust me.
The Jedi will return this once they're done with it. Hand it over, Avers.
I'd offer you transportation, but I'm afraid the shuttle only seats two. Good luck.
I can kill you both and take that prototype. No one would ever know the truth.
Do you want to die?
I suggest you give me what I want.
You're threatening us? The Republic is truly corrupt.
At least we know who to trust. Let's get out of here.
You'll have to find your own transport out of here. This one only seats two.
Your colonel won't be happy, but I'll smooth it over. I'm good with people.
Now that's smooth-talking.
I never liked him, anyway.
One thing's for sure, I'm not working for the resistance anymore. Got a spare bunk on your ship for a superb combat medic?
My mission is dangerous. Sure you want to get involved?
If you're up for it.
Danger doesn't scare me--and "involved" is my middle name.
I thought you'd never ask, Doc.
[Flirt] Absolutely.
A gentleman waits for just the right moment.
We make a good team. No sense splitting up now.
My crew could use you.
Between my good looks and your lightsaber, there's nothing we can't do.
I could use a talented doctor. Until one shows up, I'll settle for you.
You aren't that superb.
Keep working on your sense of humor. It's almost there.
Warren? I have the cloaking device prototype.
After the blood that's been spilled today, that's a ray of hope.
I'm returning to the Republic base where you first landed. Meet me there....
You rescued our spy and handed us this base. Nicely done.
Your fellow Jedi wishes to speak with you.
The resistance are the true warriors of Balmorra.
Found some other interesting things in this hangar bay. You should have them, too.
